тонкие блины 
Яйца - 3 шт.
Молоко - 250 мл (1 стакан)
Вода - 300-400 мл (1-2 стакана)
Сахар - 2 ст. ложки
Мука - 240 г (1,5 стакана)
Масло растительное - 1-2 ст. ложки
Эта игра заставит вас сменить ориентацию. Хотя вы можете остатся натуралом

Bunch of crybaby tryhards tbh. Its meh, devs could do better, its been 20yrs, get it together. 10/10

Story and characters are cheesy and most of the gameplay is repetitive but none of that bothered me in the slightest. Combat is incredibly fun and all the characters' abilities / weapons are a blast. The only genuine disappointment I had with this game is that there was no option for multiplayer. In short, I think the best way to play the game is to stop paying attention to the story and just f****** shoot people.

PS: IT IS NOT A SAINTS ROW GAME AND WAS NEVER SUPPOSED TO BE!!!!!!
虽然有骗子，但是游戏是好玩的
